pathAssistantSteps.info: The Research Office seeks approval for the Proposal, including the budget from authorised approvers. They inform the Researcher once approval is received.

The proposal is in draft.

The researcher completes team member section and adds all CVs (click on member Title and upload CV under Related tab).

The researcher enters Project Details, Budget, Documents and Agreements and Codes

Tip: Use the Chatter tab to make notes, ask questions or share updates.

When the draft is complete, click Submit to the Research Office (top-right of screen).
The researcher revises the draft and Submits to the Research Office and submits the final draft for a formal review. Click Submit to Research Office (top-right of screen).
The Research Office reviews the completed draft and provides feedback to the researcher.
The Research Office completes a compliance check before submitting the proposal for approval. If additional information is required, the Research Office will contact the researcher.
The Research Office performs a final review of the Proposal and submits it to the Funding Body.
The Research Office uploads the final documents to TRIM and adds a link to in PRIME (under Project Proposals).
The proposal is successful and is now a funded project. The Research Office records the awarded amount in PRIME and arranges a kick-off meeting with the researcher.
